name: Ezra Zion - All My Ex’s Maduro - Toro
brand: Ezra Zion, All My Ex’s Maduro
additionalNotes: Ezra Zion is noted for its cigars, coffee, beard oil, spirits and white partnerships and its on again-off again ownership of Cigar Federation. Cigar-wise, Ezra Zion is now largely known for its plethora of highly limited releases that are sold through its online stores. The company seems to have shifted strategies from selling cigars in a traditional manner to selling cigars direct.
